Html.name: Html0
Html.content:
Building up a page with the grid system involves two different steps:

  • The layout via layout rows
  • Adding content

Each task has its own element view: The "Template" view for layout rows and the "Content elements" view for adding content. Note also that not everyone can see the "Template" view. It is only visible if you are at least editor.

This separation not only makes up a clearer separation of concerns, it also (partly) omits overlapping edit points. To deal with overlapping edit points in the template view, margins can temporarily be added to rows: e.g. add "mt-50" in the element setting "Param".
